casebody.data:
IN RE: CLAYTON 296P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 18, 2017 Matthew S. Roberson, Attorney at Law, Asheville, William J. Whalen, Attorney at Law, for Clayton, Jackie B. (aka Jacqueline B. Clayton). Baxter Chad Ewing, Attorney at Law, for Wells Fargo Bank, N.A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of September 2017 by Respondent for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of September 2017."
